xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/785407-Care Bears: Starry Skies 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dx6ijoFfId86nJA01aB7H9SDClo.jpg Travel up up and away with the bravest bears around as they encounter big problems in the sky. Watch our much-loved companions as they face troublesome villains and Mother Nature in pursuit of happiness and fun. Episodes: 1. The Night the Stars Went Out - Maestro Strato - Nefarious' violin playing causes the stars to collect in his pickle jar and torrential rains to fall. 2. Dry Spell - Share Bear helps Joey and Elaine who are upset because of a dry spell in their town. 3. The Cloud Worm - A cloud quake alerts the Care Bears to an invasion of Care-a-Lot. Care Bears: Starry Skies
